TopicTitle: Firespitter propeller plane and helicopter parts v7.1 (May 5th) for KSP 1.0

Articles.Content:
Nice save .

I hope karma actually works as you are one of the few people I know deserving of its rewards instead of payback .

EDIT: Link?

EDIT 2: Never mind, finally found it on github:

https://github.com/snjo/Firespitter/releases/tag/v7.1

Finally Firespitter is back, my thanks to RoverDude and Snjo. This is one of the mods that I always installed since 0.24.

But, I think I've encountered a bug. Some parts, i.e. the propeller engine, can't be connected through nodes. I tried to use both firespitter and stock pods but it's the same. Holding Alt button would attach the node in the wrong position.

I've included the screenshots below :

So far, my installed addons are BDArmory, KerbalEngineer, Infernal Robotics, and I don't think any of these would conflict with FireSpitter.
I've installed that new version, however, the snap points on the firespitter parts are not working for me. Textures and everything else work fine, just not the snap points.
Roverdude, how do you have the time to be this epicly useful to the community??

Roverdude has been added as a collaborator on the Firespitter repository, so he now has the option to post official dll updates
Ok - I put up the release for 7.1 with KSP 1.0.2 compatibility. All works in my playthroughs, but ping if there are issues and I'll happily lend a hand in sorting them.

This is an incredibly awesome mod (it's one of the first things I drop in any new install, even beyond my dependency on it's plugin), and I'm happy to lend Snjo a hand in keeping it current for everyone

You sir, are a hero. Thanks for the update! I get my electroprops back.

Edited May 5, 2015 by Immashift
thanks for your help dude

Finally Firespitter is back, my thanks to RoverDude and Snjo. This is one of the mods that I always installed since 0.24.

But, I think I've encountered a bug. Some parts, i.e. the propeller engine, can't be connected through nodes. I tried to use both firespitter and stock pods but it's the same. Holding Alt button would attach the node in the wrong position.

I've included the screenshots below :

http://s21.postimg.org/w9y5pl3ar/image.png

http://s21.postimg.org/srm5t72er/image.png

http://s21.postimg.org/i23vn7183/image.png

So far, my installed addons are BDArmory, KerbalEngineer, Infernal Robotics, and I don't think any of these would conflict with FireSpitter.

Node issue (well rather a node fix) - I'll do a run through and take care of these

Roverdude, how do you have the time to be this epicly useful to the community??

I sleep four hours a day.
I'm not sure, but version 7.1 doesn't seem to work for me. (KSP version 1.0.2)
Specifics would be very helpful.

Hello guys, can you please tell me how can I added a firespitter module to my mod ?

I want to use the module to make an engine that'll have a spine speed depending of it's thrust, please just give me how to add the module to the mod please
RoverDude: Might be referring to the fact that the 7.1 download throws an 'incompatible with 1.0.2' message upon KSP loading. Not sure if it disables itself or not, but it is throwing an error.

I installed the mod under 1.0.2, but still get a warning when first launching that its not compatible with 1.0.2.

Any idea what i did wrong?

I installed the mod under 1.0.2, but still get a warning when first launching that its not compatible with 1.0.2.

Any idea what i did wrong?

Nothing, KAS gives a error messege but works fine.

Let me check that - since I was not getting an error with the latest DLL, but I have to do a push anyway because of attachment nodes.

Look for a 7.1.1 later today

Let me check that - since I was not getting an error with the latest DLL, but I have to do a push anyway because of attachment nodes.

Look for a 7.1.1 later today

Thank you RoverDude! I was starting to miss firespitter.

7.1.1 is up with lots of fixes to attachment nodes. Tested some creative barnstorming along the way

If you are getting a version warning, make sure you're using the latest release.

Woooooooo Firespitter is back! =D Now I can build my tilt-rotor science VTOL again.

Thanks for the hard work, gentlemen.

can someone mirror the 7.1.1 version please (latest till now) im having problems accessing github.

any mirror would be apreciated. thanks in advance

Thank you, RoverDude (for all your cool stuff and Firespitter maintenance) and Snjo (for the eternally amazing work!)

Glad to see it properly updated

Yay for my Hover boats!

can someone mirror the 7.1.1 version please (latest till now) im having problems accessing github.

any mirror would be apreciated. thanks in advance

Is this mod possibly able to simulate internal combustion to turn wheels?

Basically, I want to make a rover that uses LF and Intake Air to produce torque, which would be directed to the back wheels. Is it possible to do this with Firespitter?

Edit: Guessing that's a "no". Thanks anyway!
